querySql:
with c2s as (
select
	distinct table_catalog ,
	table_schema
from
	information_schema.tables)
select
	t.tablename as moiName,
	coalesce(ds.description) as comment,
	t.tableowner as owner,
	concat('pgsql.', c2s.table_catalog, '.', t.schemaname, '.', t.tablename) as moiDataId,
	concat('pgsql.', c2s.table_catalog, '.', t.schemaname) as moiParentDataId
from
	pg_catalog.pg_tables t
left join pg_catalog.pg_class c on
	t.tablename = c.relname
left join pg_catalog.pg_description ds on
	ds.objoid = c.oid::regclass
	and ds.objsubid = 0
left join c2s on
	t.schemaname = c2s.table_schema
where
	t.schemaname = 'public'
